title: Charlotte tells Rwitters anyone who catches will lose social welfare and food stamps permanently.
subtitle: A phony news site played by a racist defendant who claimed that Keith Lamont Scott was protesting against the "retired" in Charlotte would lose all government benefits if the looting were to take place.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Charlotte "Thorrowers" will lose all government benefits if she is caught "stealing" during protests after Keith Lamont Scott's death.
